articles.content:

articles.title: Athletics World Championships: Lord Coe defends hosting event in Doha
articles.description: IAAF chief Lord Coe once again defends the hosting of the World Championships in Doha as the 10-day competition heads towards its close.
articles.content:
Lord Coe and the IAAF have been under the spotlight over the decision to hold the championships in Qatar
2019 World Athletics Championships
Venue: Khalifa International Stadium, Doha Dates: 27 September-6 October

articles.title: Bake Off's Nadiya Hussain reveals childhood sexual assault
articles.description: The Bake Off winner says the trauma she experienced as a five year old played a role in her PTSD.
articles.content:
TV personality Nadiya Hussain has revealed she was sexually assaulted at the age of five by a relative in Bangladesh.
The 2015 Great British Bake Off winner said the trauma "played a role" in subsequent post traumatic stress disorder and panic attacks.
